descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

data.desc: If target has [Vibration], deal +(([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/2)% damage (max 20%)
data.name: Cavernous Wailing

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

data.desc:
If target has [Vibration], deal +(([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/2)% damage (max 25%)
- At 4+ highest Reson., deal +(5 + ([Vibration] on target + [Vibration] Count on target)/2)% damage instead (max 35%)
data.name: Cavernous Wailing

passiveList.desc: When this unit uses a Skill to trigger [VibrationExplosion] on an enemy, inflict 1 [AttackDown] and 2 [DefenseDown] on the enemy next turn. (3 times per turn, including E.G.O Skills)
